section_title:
13b11 - Contracts for the
construction, alteration, furnishing, or equipping of naval vessels.
text:
PCA coverage involving
work performed on boats and ships is explained in Sec 7 of R&I No. 3.  The
status of a Coast Guard ship is considered to be that of a “naval vessel” for
purposes of that Sec. (See FOH 14a19, 15c17 and 15e14.)
html: PCA coverage involving work performed on boats and ships is explained in Sec 7 of R&I No. 3.  The status of a Coast Guard ship is considered to be that of a “naval vessel” for purposes of that Sec. (See FOH 14a19, 15c17 and 15e14.)
